name: Relocation-Z-2025 Assistant
description: Cursor AI agent for development, debugging, and optimization of the Relocation-Z-2025 static web app.
instructions: Reproduce bugs in browser, check DevTools console, and verify DOM/CSS behavior.
Keep JavaScript scoped; avoid leaking globals to `window`.
Maintain responsive layout across mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Optimize performance and accessibility; run Lighthouse and ensure good Core Web Vitals.
Preserve print-optimized CSS and semantic HTML.
If adding tooling (ESLint/Prettier/Vite), keep changes minimal and opt-in with separate commits.
setup: Ensure Python 3 (for dev server) and Node.js v18+ (for scanner) are installed.
No dependencies to install; site is static.
Optional: run quick scan with `node scripts/scan.js` to catch missing assets/syntax issues.
guidelines: Ensure interactive features (selectors, calculators, Chart.js) remain functional.
Keep DOM updates efficient; avoid layout thrashing; prefer single DOM writes when possible.
Validate anchor targets exist; keep in-page navigation working.
Check keyboard accessibility and ARIA where applicable.
Prefer progressive enhancement; avoid breaking no-JS rendering.
